name: Verify that users can add multiple filter strings by clicking on the 'Add Filter String' button

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Click on Create a rule
When Click on Add filter string button
Then Check whether the new filter string is added or not

fullName: UI test cases: Verify that users can add multiple filter strings by clicking on the 'Add Filter String' button
